languages.text: {n}Кляйн брезгливо ухмыляется.{/n} "На демонопоклонника больше похож убитый, вот его скверна изуродовала. А этот... Его не трогала порча варпа, точно говорю. Из всех телесных недугов он разве что вросший ноготь предъявит".

{n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."
languages.original_text: {n}Кляйн брезгливо ухмыляется.{/n} "На демонопоклонника больше похож убитый, вот его скверна изуродовала. А этот... Его не трогала порча варпа, точно говорю. Из всех телесных недугов он разве что вросший ноготь предъявит".

{n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."

languages.text: {n}Klein affiche un sourire suffisant.{/n} « Au vu de ses entrailles contrefaites, le défunt mutant correspondait davantage au profil d'un adorateur de démons. Quant à celui-ci... Le fait est que son corps ne présente pas la moindre trace de l'influence du Warp. La pire anomalie qu'on pourrait y trouver, c'est un ongle incarné. »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein affiche un sourire suffisant.{/n} « Au vu de ses entrailles contrefaites, le défunt mutant correspondait davantage au profil d'un adorateur de démons. Quant à celui-ci... Le fait est que son corps ne présente pas la moindre trace de l'influence du Warp. La pire anomalie qu'on pourrait y trouver, c'est un ongle incarné. »

languages.text: {n}Klein sonríe.{/n} «A mí el mutante muerto me parecía más bien un adorador de daemons, con las tripas retorcidas y demás. En cuanto a este... su cuerpo no ha sido alterado por la disformidad, desde luego. Como mucho, tendrá una uña encarnada».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein sonríe.{/n} «A mí el mutante muerto me parecía más bien un adorador de daemons, con las tripas retorcidas y demás. En cuanto a este... su cuerpo no ha sido alterado por la disformidad, desde luego. Como mucho, tendrá una uña encarnada».

languages.text: {n}克莱因得意地笑了起来。{/n}“在我看来，那个死了的变种人反倒是更像崇拜恶魔的家伙，他的内脏都已经一团糟了。至于这家伙……毫无疑问，他身上没有一丁点亚空间的痕迹。他身上最扭曲的部分，估计最多也就是指甲长到肉里了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因得意地笑了起来。{/n}“在我看来，那个死了的变种人反倒是更像崇拜恶魔的家伙，他的内脏都已经一团糟了。至于这家伙……毫无疑问，他身上没有一丁点亚空间的痕迹。他身上最扭曲的部分，估计最多也就是指甲长到肉里了。”

languages.text: {n}クラインはニヤリと笑った。{/n}「死んだ変異体はディーモン崇拝者のようだった。内臓が全てねじ曲がっていたからだ。こいつはというと…。身体に<歪み>の形跡はない。最悪、巻き爪くらいしかないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインはニヤリと笑った。{/n}「死んだ変異体はディーモン崇拝者のようだった。内臓が全てねじ曲がっていたからだ。こいつはというと…。身体に<歪み>の形跡はない。最悪、巻き爪くらいしかないだろう」

languages.text: {n}Klein verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der tote Mutant sah mir eher aus wie ein Dämonenanbeter, so wie seine Eingeweide entstellt waren. Und was diesen hier angeht ... Sein Körper wurde nicht vom Warp berührt, das steht fest. Das Schlimmste, was er uns zeigen kann, ist ein eingewachsener Nagel."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der tote Mutant sah mir eher aus wie ein Dämonenanbeter, so wie seine Eingeweide entstellt waren. Und was diesen hier angeht ... Sein Körper wurde nicht vom Warp berührt, das steht fest. Das Schlimmste, was er uns zeigen kann, ist ein eingewachsener Nagel."

languages.text: {n}Klein sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ölü mutant, eğri büğrü iç organlarıyla bana daha çok iblis müridi gibi göründü. Buradakine gelirsek... Bedenine öteboyutun uğramadığı aşikâr. En kötü senaryoda bize içe doğru büyüyen tırnağını filan gösterir."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein smirks.{/n} "The dead mutant looked more like a daemon worshipper to me, the way his guts were all twisted. As for this one here... There's no touch of the warp on his body, that's for sure. The worst he'll be able to show us is an ingrown nail."
